title.rendered: Keeping Dr. Kalam’s legacy alive with “I am Kalam”

content.rendered:
Dr. Kalam believed that if children of our country are given the opportunity to realize their dreams, India could become the most powerful nation in the world. He spent his entire life encouraging children to dream, travelling across the country.

His thoughts, way of living, philosophy and teachings have been an enduring source of guidance for Smile Foundation. I AM KALAM, a children’s movie produced by Smile Foundation that won many hearts and accolades stemmed from his ideologies and vision for the children of the country.

In our continued effort to keep Dr. Kalam’s thoughts alive forever and connect with children and youth across the country, Smile Foundation conducted a special screening of “I AM KALAM” in schools across India on his birth anniversary, under its Child For Child programme.

This initiative brought together thousands of children, uniting them through Dr. Kalam’s legacy and the uplifting story portrayed in the film.
